nodes.text: Drola Kinn was a Dathomirian male member of the Broken Columns Clan, a group of male Witches of Dathomir. He was young and single at the time of the Conclave between Broken Columns and the Raining Leaves Clans. He had one many of the games held during the conclave. He was chosen, along with Halliava Vurse, to be witness to Ben Skywalker claiming a hill for a Jedi camp. The two clans joined the Jedi there to defend themselves against the Nightsisters.
